#include<iostream>
#include<algorithm>
#include<cstdio>
#include<string.h>
#include<climits>
#include<vector>
#include<stack>
#include<set>
#include<math.h>
using namespace std;
#define FOR(i,a,b) for(i=a;i<=b;i++)
#define sint(i) scanf("%d",&i)
#define ss(s) scanf("%s",s)
#define pii pair<int,int>
#define mp(i,j) make_pair(i,j)
#define ll long long
#define MAX 1000000000
#define MOD 1000000007
#define vi vector<int>
#define vvi vector < vi >
#define pb(i) push_back(i);
#define tr(v,it) for(it=v.begin();it!=v.end();it++)
int main()
{
    int i;
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    while(t--)
    {

        int n;
        cin>>n;
        int a[n];
        for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
        {
            cin>>a[i];
            cout<<a[i];
        }
        cout<<endl;
        int pos=-1;
        for(int i=n-1;i>0;i--)
        {
            if(a[i]>a[i-1])
            {
                pos=i-1;
                break;
            }
        }
        if(pos==-1)
        {
            cout<<"NO NXTBIG\n";
        }
        else
        {
            int num=11,num_pos;
            for(int i=pos;i<n;i++)
            {
                if(a[i]>a[pos] && a[i]<=num)
                {
                    num=a[i];
                    num_pos=i;
                }
            }
            swap(a[num_pos],a[pos]);
            reverse(a+pos+1,a+n);
            for(int i=0;i<n;i++)
            cout<<a[i];
            cout<<"\n";
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
